Title: Why Wall Street is cooling on Apple stock
Summary: NVIDIA Corporation has outperformed Apple in terms of stock performance, with a 239% increase compared to Apple's 50% rise in 2023. Apple is facing concerns about weakening iPhone demand and declining revenue, while NVIDIA's strong performance is attributed to its focus on AI technology.
Analysis: NVIDIA Corporation's stock has outperformed Apple's, indicating a positive sentiment. This is due to NVIDIA's strong performance driven by its focus on AI technology, while Apple faces concerns about weakening iPhone demand and declining revenue.

Title: UPDATE 1-Search startup Perplexity AI valued at $520 mln in funding from Bezos, Nvidia
Summary: Perplexity AI, a search startup, has raised $73.6 million in funding from investors including Nvidia and Jeff Bezos. The company's search tools utilize large language models to provide instant answers to user queries, and it plans to use the funding to expand its team and develop its products.
Analysis: The sentiment of the summary is neutral because it does not explicitly indicate a positive or negative effect on NVIDIA Corporation's stock. While the funding from NVIDIA and Jeff Bezos suggests a positive aspect, the impact on the stock cannot be determined without further information on the potential benefits or risks associated with the investment in Perplexity AI.

Title: Search startup Perplexity AI valued at $520 million in funding from Bezos, Nvidia
Summary: NVIDIA Corporation has invested in Perplexity AI, an artificial intelligence startup, as part of a funding round that valued the company at $520 million. The funding will support Perplexity AI's customer adoption and global expansion efforts.
Analysis: The sentiment of the summary is neutral because it does not explicitly mention any positive or negative aspects. NVIDIA Corporation's investment in Perplexity AI can have a positive effect on its stock as it signifies the company's interest in AI technology and potential growth opportunities. However, the impact cannot be accurately determined without more information about Perplexity AI's performance and market potential.
